CatDescriptText: Miss Benetta Christian, 7918 Tacoma Street, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 14, 1957, pg. 3, with question: "Do you think that the City of Pittsburgh should own and operate its transportation system (street cars and buses)?" answer reads: "Definitely, the city should. This is such an awful situation to be in."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Benetta Christian, wearing dark dress with light colored lace collar, brooch, and bracelets, standing with right hand pulling on left sleeve in front of light colored marble pillar between storefront windows with female mannequins wearing dresses
